00006 class POMUtilTrimTriple
00007 {
00013         public $leading_space;
00019         public $trimmed;
00025         public $trailing_space;
00026 
00033         public function POMUtilTrimTriple($text)
00034         {
00035                 $this->trimmed = trim($text);
00036                 if (strlen($this->trimmed) > 0)
00037                 {
00038                         $this->leading_space = substr($text, 0, strpos($text, $this->trimmed));
00039                         if (strpos($text, $this->trimmed) + strlen($this->trimmed) < strlen($text))
00040                         {
00041                                 $this->trailing_space = substr($text, strpos($text, $this->trimmed) + strlen($this->trimmed));
00042                         }
00043                         else
00044                         {
00045                                 $this->trailing_space = '';
00046                         }
00047                 }
00048                 else
00049                 {
00050                         $this->leading_space = '';
00051                         $this->trailing_space = $text;
00052                 }
00053         }
00054 
00055         public function toString()
00056         {
00057                 return $this->leading_space.$this->trimmed.$this->trailing_space;
00058         }
00059 }

00073 class POMUtilTrimParameterValueTriple extends POMUtilTrimTriple
00074 {
00081         public function POMUtilTrimParameterValueTriple($text)
00082         {
00083                 // adds a page object reference as value of the trimmed attribute
00084                 $__trimmed = trim($text);
00085                 $__pomPage = new POMPage("temporarypage", $__trimmed);
00086                 $this->trimmed = &$__pomPage;
00087 
00088                 if (strlen($this->trimmed->toString()) > 0)
00089                 {
00090                         $this->leading_space = substr($text, 0, strpos($text, $this->trimmed));
00091                         if (strpos($text, $this->trimmed->toString()) + strlen($this->trimmed->toString()) < strlen($text))
00092                         {
00093                                 $this->trailing_space = substr($text, strpos($text, $this->trimmed->toString()) + strlen($this->trimmed->toString()));
00094                         }
00095                         else
00096                         {
00097                                 $this->trailing_space = '';
00098                         }
00099                 }
00100                 else
00101                 {
00102                         $this->leading_space = '';
00103                         $this->trailing_space = $text;
00104                         // add an empty POMSimpleText object to the page
00105                         $this->trimmed->addElement(new POMSimpleText(''));
00106                 }
00107         }
00108 
00109         public function toString()
00110         {
00111                 return $this->leading_space.$this->trimmed->toString().$this->trailing_space;
00112         }

00114 class POMUrlUtil{
00121         public function url_exists($url) {
00122                 $hdrs = @get_headers($url);
00123                 return is_array($hdrs) ? preg_match('/^HTTP\\/\\d+\\.\\d+\\s+2\\d\\d\\s+.*$/',$hdrs[0]) : false;
00124         }
